10-10-2024: - Fixed Ricochet not bouncing off of {AbilityIcon|Ability=Mini Turret|Size=20} Mini Turrets
09-26-2024: - Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Ricochet|Size=20} Ricochet not respecting LOS when picking the targets
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate reduced from 12% to 10%
- Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Ricochet|Size=20} Ricochet'd bullets not returning the right amount of damage
08-29-2024: - Fixed not applying spirit bonus damage from Vindicta and {AbilityIcon|Ability=Wraith|Size=20} Wraith abilities
08-15-2024: - Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Ricochet|Size=20} Ricochet sometimes shooting the extra bullet from your gun rather than the target
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate increased from +8% to +12%
